subject: O bănet revive my cluch pedal
description_text:
Hi, have the order #SSN3571 i haven’t recice my cluch pedals it is not
normal to pay for full pedals and don’t receive my clutch. I what my clutch
pedal as sone as posibile. I dont want excuses about this.

conversations.body_text: Hi Andrei Chitu,  We sincerely apologize for sending the wrong order. You were supposed to receive a 3-pedal set, but we sent a 2-pedal set instead. We will promptly send the correct product tomorrow.
Hi Andrei Chitu, Additionally, please take photos of the packaging and the received product.

Hi Andrei Chitu,    Here is your additional link. The package has arrived in Hungary and is expected to be delivered to Romania within the next couple of days.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=YT2534300707185877
